DOC.brief_summary: This study 4 period study see interaction Orally-Administered Oseltamivir Intravenous Zanamivir Healthy Thai Adult Subjects
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Orally-Administered Oseltamivir Intravenous Zanamivir Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy Volunteer ( ) confirm physical exam , clinical lab , ECGs , vitals Must woman nonchildbearing potential willing abstain intercourse two week prior study drug administration throughout study willing use two acceptable method birth control . Exclusion criterion : Subjects history certain heart problem subject Hepatitis B , C HIV .
